org.thethingsnetwork.account.sync.auth.grant

Class AuthorizationCode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.thethingsnetwork.account.common.GrantType
      • org.thethingsnetwork.account.sync.auth.grant.AuthorizationCode

  • public class AuthorizationCode
extends GrantType
    This token provider uses authorization-code flow, meaning it requires user-interraction
    Author:
    Romain Cambier

    • Method Detail

      • getAccountServer

        public URI getAccountServer()
        Description copied from class: GrantType
        Get the account server used by this token provider
        Specified by:
        getAccountServer in class GrantType
        Returns:
        The account server URI

      • buildAuthorizationURL

        public okhttp3.HttpUrl buildAuthorizationURL(URI _redirect)
        Generate an authorization endpoint to be sent to the user. Once the user will proceed to authorization (even in case of error) he will redirected to the provided URI, with some query parameters including the code in case of success, or an error if something went wrong Warning: The redirect URI has to be whitelisted in the account server !
        Parameters:
        _redirect - The redirect URI where the user should be driven after authorization
        Returns:
        The HttpUrl where the user should go to access the authorization form

      • getToken

        public RenewableJsonWebToken getToken(String _authorizationCode)
        Request a token from an authorization-code after successfull authorization
        Parameters:
        _authorizationCode - the authorization-code generated by the account server
        Returns:
        the RenewableJsonWebToken
